QuestData.Title: The Many Images of Kalecgos
QuestData.Description:
Good to formally meet you, $n. My name is Kalecgos, Archmage of the Kirin Tor and Aspect of the blue dragonflight.
I'm having difficulty repairing the Azure Archives to reclaim the Azure Oathstone. I could use an extra pair of physical hands.
I'm currently up in the archives themselves. I was able to reactivate the pylon outside, which should allow you to traverse up here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Crystal Pylon to reach the Azure Archives.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Kalecgos within the Azure Archives.
QuestData.RewardText: Let's get to work. It's imperative to reclaim the Azure Oathstone.
